definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: This emerging awakening is a blessing from Source of All.
sentences.chinese: 这一浮现的觉醒是万有之源的一份祝福。

sentences.english: He is Master of everything and he is with you today.
sentences.chinese: 这位万有之主，今天正与你同在。

sentences.english: With God things don't just happen ev'rything by Him is planned.
sentences.chinese: 在神万事非偶然，都是祂计划万有。

sentences.english: The ultimate goal as I reminded you earlier is the return to the Source of ALL.
sentences.chinese: 我早先所提醒你们的终极目标，是回归万有之源头。

sentences.english: With God things don't just happen; everything by Him is planned.
sentences.chinese: 在神万事非偶然，都是祂计划万有。

sentences.english: The sea overwhelms us with forcefulness.
sentences.chinese: 大海因为包容万有而被人重视。

sentences.english: He is the God of boundless resources.
sentences.chinese: 神是万有之神，祂不受限制。

sentences.english: Still be my Vision, O Ruler of all.
sentences.chinese: 掌管万有王，永作我异象。

sentences.english: Therefore let no man glory in men. For all things are yours;
sentences.chinese: 所以无论谁，都不可拿人夸口，因为万有全是你们的。

sentences.english: The head of the universe is head of the home.
sentences.chinese: 万有之首也是万家之主。

sentences.english: Since God made all things, he deserves all the glory.
sentences.chinese: 因为神创造万有，因此他配得一切的荣耀。

sentences.english: The existence and uniqueness of universal unfolding are proved.
sentences.chinese: 证明了万有开折的存在性和唯一性。

sentences.english: Your God is Lord over all, v. 11.
sentences.chinese: 你们的神是掌管万有的主。

definition: God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
(third person pronoun for a divine being)
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
trustworthy/reliable/to believe something to be true
actual situation/the ultimate essence of things (Buddhism)
